person.persName: Daniel Morton (Logan County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk.)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Marmaduke B. Morton, Sr., and Elizabeth Morton. Married to Susan E. M. Booker Morton in Logan County, Kentucky, on October 1, 1851. Deputy clerk in Logan County in 1850. Household owned sixteen enslaved persons in Logan County in 1850. Circuit court clerk in Logan County in 1860. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Logan County in 1860.
